item.description:
I was recommended going to the Newport Storm as an event.  I thought it would be fun to go on a tour at 3pm then go out to an early dinner somewhere in Newport afterwards.

The Newport Storm Brewery and Thomas Tew Distillery has opened its doors to the public!  Finished in the Spring of 2011, their new facility houses increased capacity and a welcoming Visitors Center where you can come and see how me make tasty Newport Storm Beer and Thomas Tew Rum!

Guided beer tours and tastings are $7 plus tax ($7.49) and includes: four Newport Storm Beer samples including our year-round beers and seasonal or experimental varieties, and your souvenir tasting glass. Money will be collected at the door.  Beer tastings are a great opportunity to find out which of our Newport-brewed beers to look for on your visit to Newport's fine eateries!  There is also a gift shop where you can pick up some things if you so desire.

Check out the virtual tour on You Tube!

If you like the Beer Tour a lot, maybe we can plan a Rum Tour next time...

If you RSVP to go and then have to change your answer to a no, please do so by noon that Saturday of the Meet-up.  There will be a waiting list for this event.

I look forward to seeing you there.  And I'll take any suggestions for restaurants afterwards for early dinner.

Cheers, Tonia
item.name: Newport Storm Beer Tasting Tour
